mapper.select:
SELECT p.PROFESSORNUM, p.MAJORNUM, m.MAJORNAME, p.PROFESSORPW, p.PROFESSORNAME, p.PROFESSORPHONE, TO_CHAR(p.hiredate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') HIREDATE
FROM PROFESSOR p JOIN MAJOR m ON p.MAJORNUM = m.MAJORNUM WHERE PROFESSORNUM = #{professornum}
mapper.insert:
select max(PROFESSORNUM)+1 from professor
insert into professor(PROFESSORNUM, MAJORNUM, PROFESSORPW,PROFESSORNAME,PROFESSORPHONE,HIREDATE) values (#{professornum}, #{majornum}, #{professorpw}, #{professorname}, #{professorphone}, #{hiredate})
mapper.update: UPDATE PROFESSOR SET MAJORNUM=#{majornum}, PROFESSORNAME=#{professorname}, PROFESSORPHONE=#{professorphone}, HIREDATE=#{hiredate}, PROFESSORPW=#{professorpw} WHERE PROFESSORNUM=#{professornum}
